channel.title: Changing Smithing
channel.description:
So i want to make it so u can smith silver bars and gold bars at level 93 and level 99
I also want to make so silver bars can make white armor and gold guilded but i cant find were the gold bar is in the smithing code
Smithinginterface.java [url=http://pastebin.com/Ja8fxBYq]http://pastebin.com/Ja8fxBYq[/url]
smithing.java [url=http://pastebin.com/8C0wY81a]http://pastebin.com/8C0wY81a[/url]

item.title: Changing Smithing
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:534342”]I started an enum:

[code=java]package server.model.players.skills;

import server.model.players.Client;

public enum Forging {

BRONZE_DAGGER(1205, 1, 1, 13),
BRONZE_AXE(1351, 1, 1, 13),
BRONZE_CHAIN(1103, 11, 3, 38),
BRONZE_MEDHELM(1139, 1, 1, 13),
BRONZE_BOLTS(877, 3, 1, 13),
BRONZE_SWORD(1277, 4, 1, 13),
BRONZE_MACE(1422, 2, 1, 13),
BRONZE_PLATELEGS(1075, 16, 3, 38),
BRONZE_FULLHELM(1155, 7, 2, 25),
BRONZE_ARROWTIPS(39, 5, 1, 13),
BRONZE_SCIMITAR(1321, 5, 2, 25),
BRONZE_WARHAMMER(1337, 9, 3, 38),
BRONZE_PLATESKIRT(1087, 16, 3, 38),
BRONZE_SQSHIELD(1173, 8, 2, 25),
BRONZE_KNIVES(864, 7, 1, 12),
BRONZE_LONGSWORD(1291, 6, 2, 25),
BRONZE_BATTLEAXE(1375, 10, 3, 38),
BRONZE_PLATEBODY(1117, 18, 5, 63),
BRONZE_KITE(1189, 12, 1, 38),
BRONZE_2HAND(1307, 14, 3, 38),
BRONZE_CLAWS(3095, 13, 2, 1),
BRONZE_NAILS(4819, 4, 1, 13),
RUNE_NAILS(4824, 89, 1, 75);
private int id, level, bars, xp;

private Forging(int id, int level, int bars, int xp) {
    this.id = id;
    this.level = level;
    this.bars = bars;
    this.xp = xp;
}
public int getId(int Id) {
    return id;
}
public int getLevel(int lvl) {
    return level;
}
public int getBars(int bar) {
    return bars;
}
public int getXp(int XP) {
    return xp;
}
public void handleForge(Client c, int ID, int LVL, int BAR, int XD){
	
}

}[/code]
lol[/quote]

mine is here lol

[code] DAGGER___(1205, 1203, 1207, 1209, 1211, 1213, 1, 12, 25, 37, 50, 62, 75, 1, 15, 30, 50, 75, 80, 1119),
SWORD____(1277, 1279, 1281, 1285, 1287, 1289, 1, 14, 28, 39, 55, 68, 80, 4, 19, 34, 54, 74, 89, 1119),
SCIMITAR_(1321, 1323, 1325, 1329, 1331, 1333, 2, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 5, 20, 35, 55, 75, 85, 1119),
LONGSWORD(1291, 1293, 1295, 1299, 1301, 1303, 2, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 6, 21, 36, 56, 76, 86, 1119),
TWO_HANDS(1307, 1309, 1311, 1315, 1417, 1319, 3, 38, 75, 113,150, 188, 225, 14,29, 44, 64, 84, 99, 1119);
// br iron stel mith addy rune b xp xp xp xp xp xp lv lv lv lv lv lv interface

	/*
	 *  AXE(), MACE(), WARHAMMER(), BATTLEAXE(),

item.title: Changing Smithing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I started an enum:

[code=java]package server.model.players.skills;

import server.model.players.Client;

public enum Forging {

BRONZE_DAGGER(1205, 1, 1, 13),
BRONZE_AXE(1351, 1, 1, 13),
BRONZE_CHAIN(1103, 11, 3, 38),
BRONZE_MEDHELM(1139, 1, 1, 13),
BRONZE_BOLTS(877, 3, 1, 13),
BRONZE_SWORD(1277, 4, 1, 13),
BRONZE_MACE(1422, 2, 1, 13),
BRONZE_PLATELEGS(1075, 16, 3, 38),
BRONZE_FULLHELM(1155, 7, 2, 25),
BRONZE_ARROWTIPS(39, 5, 1, 13),
BRONZE_SCIMITAR(1321, 5, 2, 25),
BRONZE_WARHAMMER(1337, 9, 3, 38),
BRONZE_PLATESKIRT(1087, 16, 3, 38),
BRONZE_SQSHIELD(1173, 8, 2, 25),
BRONZE_KNIVES(864, 7, 1, 12),
BRONZE_LONGSWORD(1291, 6, 2, 25),
BRONZE_BATTLEAXE(1375, 10, 3, 38),
BRONZE_PLATEBODY(1117, 18, 5, 63),
BRONZE_KITE(1189, 12, 1, 38),
BRONZE_2HAND(1307, 14, 3, 38),
BRONZE_CLAWS(3095, 13, 2, 1),
BRONZE_NAILS(4819, 4, 1, 13),
RUNE_NAILS(4824, 89, 1, 75);
private int id, level, bars, xp;

private Forging(int id, int level, int bars, int xp) {
    this.id = id;
    this.level = level;
    this.bars = bars;
    this.xp = xp;
}
public int getId(int Id) {
    return id;
}
public int getLevel(int lvl) {
    return level;
}
public int getBars(int bar) {
    return bars;
}
public int getXp(int XP) {
    return xp;
}
public void handleForge(Client c, int ID, int LVL, int BAR, int XD){
	
}

}[/code]
lol

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Smithing
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:534342”][quote author=JCor9 link=topic=653138.msg4376480#msg4376480 date=1382205380]
ok do i just change my smithing interface an dsmithing.java to yours?
[/quote]
I don’t have a smithing.java
I said smithinginterface.

[code=java]package server.model.players.skills;

import server.model.players.Client;

public class SmithingInterface {

Client c;
private int itemID;
private String barType;

public SmithingInterface(Client c) {
	this.c = c;
}

public void showSmithInterface(int itemId) {
	itemID = itemId;
	sendBasicText(c);
	if (itemID == 2349){
		makeBronzeInterface(c);
		barType = "bronze";
	}
	if (itemID == 2351){
		makeIronInterface(c);
		barType = "iron";
	}
	if (itemID == 2353){
		makeSteelInterface(c);
		barType = "steel";
	}
	if (itemID == 2359){
		makeMithInterface(c);
		barType = "mith";
	}
	if (itemID == 2361){
		makeAddyInterface(c);
		barType = "addy";
	}
	if (itemID == 2363){
		makeRuneInterface(c);
		barType = "rune";
	}

}
private void sendBasicText(Client c){
	String fiveb = GetForBars(itemID, 5, c);
	String threeb = GetForBars(itemID, 3, c);
	String twob = GetForBars(itemID, 2, c);
	String oneb = GetForBars(itemID, 1, c);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(fiveb+"5 Bars"+fiveb, 1112);//Platebody bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1109);//Chainbody Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1110);//Plateleg Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1118);//Warhammer bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1111);//Plateskirt bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1095);//Battleaxe bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1115);//Kiteshield bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1090);//2h Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1113);//Fullhelm bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1116);//Scimitar bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1114);//Square Shield bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1089);//Longsword bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 8428);//Claws bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1124);//Sword Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1125);//Dagger Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1126);//Axe Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1127);//Med Helm Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                               1 Bar"+oneb, 1128);//Bolt Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1129);//Mace Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                               1 Bar"+oneb, 1130);//Arrowtip bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                               1 Bar"+oneb, 1131);//Throwing Knife Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"1 Bar"+oneb, 13357);//Nail bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+""+oneb, 11459);//Not used now
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Dagger", 1094);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Axe", 1091);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Chainbody", 1098);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Medium helm", 1102);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                Bolts", 1107);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Sword", 1085);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Mace", 1093);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Platelegs", 1099);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Full helm", 1103);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("         Arrowtips", 1108);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Scimitar", 1087);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Warhammer", 1083);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Plateskirt", 1100);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Sq. Shield", 1104);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("        Th. Knives", 1106);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Longsword", 1086);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Battleaxe", 1092);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Platebody", 1101);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          2h sword", 1088);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Kiteshield", 1105);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Claws", 8429);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Nails", 13358);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	 c.getPA().showInterface(994);
}
private void makeRuneInterface(Client c) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1213,0,1119,1); //dagger
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1359,0,1120,1); //axe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1113,0,1121,1); //chain body
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1147,0,1122,1); //med helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9144,0,1123,10); //Bolts
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1289,1,1119,1); //s-sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1432,1,1120,1); //mace
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1079,1,1121,1); //platelegs
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1163,1,1122,1); //full helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(44,1,1123,15); //arrowtips
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1333,2,1119,1); //scimmy
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1347,2,1120,1); //warhammer
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1093,2,1121,1); //plateskirt
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1185,2,1122,1); //Sq. Shield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(868,2,1123,5); //throwing-knives
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1303,3,1119,1); //longsword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1373,3,1120,1); //battleaxe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1127,3,1121,1); //platebody
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1201,3,1122,1); //kiteshield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1319,4,1119,1); //2h sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(4824,4,1122,15); //nails
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(-1,3,1123, 1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(3101,4,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11459);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
}

private void makeAddyInterface(Client c) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1211,0,1119,1); //dagger
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1357,0,1120,1); //axe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1111,0,1121,1); //chain body
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1145,0,1122,1); //med helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9143,0,1123,10); //Bolts
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1287,1,1119,1); //s-sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1430,1,1120,1); //mace
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1073,1,1121,1); //platelegs
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1161,1,1122,1); //full helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(43,1,1123,15); //arrowtips
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1331,2,1119,1); //scimmy
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1345,2,1120,1); //warhammer
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1091,2,1121,1); //plateskirt
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1183,2,1122,1); //Sq. Shield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(867,2,1123,5); //throwing-knives
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1301,3,1119,1); //longsword
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1371,3,1120,1); //battleaxe
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1123,3,1121,1); //platebody
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1199,3,1122,1); //kiteshield
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1317,4,1119,1); //2h sword
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(4823,4,1122,15); //nails
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(-1,3,1123, 1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(3100,4,1120,1);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11459);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
}

private void makeMithInterface(Client c) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1209,0,1119,1); //dagger
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1355,0,1120,1); //axe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1109,0,1121,1); //chain body
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1143,0,1122,1); //med helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9142,0,1123,10); //Bolts
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1285,1,1119,1); //s-sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1428,1,1120,1); //mace
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1071,1,1121,1); //platelegs
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1159,1,1122,1); //full helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(42,1,1123,15); //arrowtips
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1329,2,1119,1); //scimmy
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1343,2,1120,1); //warhammer
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1085,2,1121,1); //plateskirt
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1181,2,1122,1); //Sq. Shield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(866,2,1123,5); //throwing-knives
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1299,3,1119,1); //longsword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1369,3,1120,1); //battleaxe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1121,3,1121,1); //platebody
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1197,3,1122,1); //kiteshield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1315,4,1119,1); //2h sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(4822,4,1122,15); //nails
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(-1,3,1123, 1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(3099,4,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11459);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
}

private void makeSteelInterface(Client c) {
	String oneb = GetForBars(itemID, 1, c);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar",1132);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                1 Bar",1135);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                    Kiteshield", 1105);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cannon Balls",1096);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("    Studs",1134);
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1207,0,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1353,0,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1105,0,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1141,0,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9141,0,1123,10);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1281,1,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1424,1,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1069,1,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1157,1,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(41,1,1123,15);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1325,2,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1339,2,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1083,2,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1177,2,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(865,2,1123,5);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1295,3,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1365,3,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1119,3,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1193,3,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1311,4,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1539,4,1122,15);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(2,3,1123,4);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(2370,4,1123,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(3097,4,1120,1);
}

private void makeIronInterface(Client c) 
{
	String oneb = GetForBars(itemID, 1, c);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                1 Bar", 11459);//
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1203,0,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1349,0,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1101,0,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1137,0,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9140,0,1123,10);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1279,1,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1420,1,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1067,1,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1153,1,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(40,1,1123,15);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1323,2,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1335,2,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1081,2,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1175,2,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(863,2,1123,5);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1293,3,1119,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1363,3,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1115,3,1121,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1191,3,1122,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1309,4,1119,1);

	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
}
///TODO: Level check for if you can/can't make an item
private String GetForBars(int i, int j, Client c) {
	if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, j))
	return "@gre@";
	
	return "@red@";
}
@SuppressWarnings("unused")
private String getForLvl(int id){
	if(barType.equalsIgnoreCase("bronze")){
		if(c.playerLevel[13] > Smithing.bronzeData[id][2]){
			return "@whi@";
		}else{
			return "@bla@";
		}
	}
	return "@bla@";
	
}

}[/code][/quote]Smithing is a pain to add. i still haven’t finished filling my enum lolol

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Smithing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

JCor9:

ok do i just change my smithing interface an dsmithing.java to yours?

I don’t have a smithing.java
I said smithinginterface.

[code=java]package server.model.players.skills;

import server.model.players.Client;

public class SmithingInterface {

Client c;
private int itemID;
private String barType;

public SmithingInterface(Client c) {
	this.c = c;
}

public void showSmithInterface(int itemId) {
	itemID = itemId;
	sendBasicText(c);
	if (itemID == 2349){
		makeBronzeInterface(c);
		barType = "bronze";
	}
	if (itemID == 2351){
		makeIronInterface(c);
		barType = "iron";
	}
	if (itemID == 2353){
		makeSteelInterface(c);
		barType = "steel";
	}
	if (itemID == 2359){
		makeMithInterface(c);
		barType = "mith";
	}
	if (itemID == 2361){
		makeAddyInterface(c);
		barType = "addy";
	}
	if (itemID == 2363){
		makeRuneInterface(c);
		barType = "rune";
	}

}
private void sendBasicText(Client c){
	String fiveb = GetForBars(itemID, 5, c);
	String threeb = GetForBars(itemID, 3, c);
	String twob = GetForBars(itemID, 2, c);
	String oneb = GetForBars(itemID, 1, c);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(fiveb+"5 Bars"+fiveb, 1112);//Platebody bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1109);//Chainbody Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1110);//Plateleg Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1118);//Warhammer bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1111);//Plateskirt bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1095);//Battleaxe bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1115);//Kiteshield bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(threeb+"3 Bars"+threeb, 1090);//2h Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1113);//Fullhelm bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1116);//Scimitar bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1114);//Square Shield bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 1089);//Longsword bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(twob+"                                  2 Bars"+twob, 8428);//Claws bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1124);//Sword Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1125);//Dagger Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1126);//Axe Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1127);//Med Helm Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                               1 Bar"+oneb, 1128);//Bolt Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                                  1 Bar"+oneb, 1129);//Mace Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                               1 Bar"+oneb, 1130);//Arrowtip bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"                               1 Bar"+oneb, 1131);//Throwing Knife Bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+"1 Bar"+oneb, 13357);//Nail bars
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(oneb+""+oneb, 11459);//Not used now
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Dagger", 1094);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Axe", 1091);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Chainbody", 1098);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Medium helm", 1102);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                Bolts", 1107);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Sword", 1085);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Mace", 1093);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Platelegs", 1099);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Full helm", 1103);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("         Arrowtips", 1108);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Scimitar", 1087);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Warhammer", 1083);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Plateskirt", 1100);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Sq. Shield", 1104);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("        Th. Knives", 1106);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Longsword", 1086);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Battleaxe", 1092);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Platebody", 1101);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          2h sword", 1088);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Kiteshield", 1105);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                     Claws", 8429);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("                          Nails", 13358);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	 c.getPA().showInterface(994);
}
private void makeRuneInterface(Client c) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1213,0,1119,1); //dagger
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1359,0,1120,1); //axe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1113,0,1121,1); //chain body
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1147,0,1122,1); //med helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9144,0,1123,10); //Bolts
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1289,1,1119,1); //s-sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1432,1,1120,1); //mace
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1079,1,1121,1); //platelegs
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1163,1,1122,1); //full helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(44,1,1123,15); //arrowtips
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1333,2,1119,1); //scimmy
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1347,2,1120,1); //warhammer
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1093,2,1121,1); //plateskirt
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1185,2,1122,1); //Sq. Shield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(868,2,1123,5); //throwing-knives
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1303,3,1119,1); //longsword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1373,3,1120,1); //battleaxe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1127,3,1121,1); //platebody
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1201,3,1122,1); //kiteshield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1319,4,1119,1); //2h sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(4824,4,1122,15); //nails
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(-1,3,1123, 1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(3101,4,1120,1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11459);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
}

private void makeAddyInterface(Client c) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1211,0,1119,1); //dagger
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1357,0,1120,1); //axe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1111,0,1121,1); //chain body
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1145,0,1122,1); //med helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9143,0,1123,10); //Bolts
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1287,1,1119,1); //s-sword
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1430,1,1120,1); //mace
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1073,1,1121,1); //platelegs
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1161,1,1122,1); //full helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(43,1,1123,15); //arrowtips
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1331,2,1119,1); //scimmy
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1345,2,1120,1); //warhammer
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1091,2,1121,1); //plateskirt
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1183,2,1122,1); //Sq. Shield
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(867,2,1123,5); //throwing-knives
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1301,3,1119,1); //longsword
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1371,3,1120,1); //battleaxe
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1123,3,1121,1); //platebody
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1199,3,1122,1); //kiteshield
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1317,4,1119,1); //2h sword
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(4823,4,1122,15); //nails
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(-1,3,1123, 1);
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(3100,4,1120,1);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1135);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1134);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11461);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",11459);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1132);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("",1096);
}

private void makeMithInterface(Client c) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame34(1209,0,1119,1); //dagger
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1355,0,1120,1); //axe
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1109,0,1121,1); //chain body
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(1143,0,1122,1); //med helm
	 c.getPA().sendFrame34(9142,0,1123,10); //Bolts

///TODO: Level check for if you can/can't make an item
private String GetForBars(int i, int j, Client c) {
	if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, j))
	return "@gre@";
	
	return "@red@";
}
@SuppressWarnings("unused")
private String getForLvl(int id){
	if(barType.equalsIgnoreCase("bronze")){
		if(c.playerLevel[13] > Smithing.bronzeData[id][2]){
